mapper.insert: insert into CTP_DEAL_MSG ( broker_Id, investor_Id, instrument_Id, order_Ref, user_Id, exchange_Id, trade_ID, direction, order_Sys_Id, participant_Id, client_ID, trading_Role, exchange_Inst_ID, offset_Flag, hedge_Flag, price, volume, trade_Date, trade_Time, trade_Type, price_Source, trader_ID, order_Local_Id, clearing_Part_ID, business_Unit, sequence_No, trading_Day, settlement_Id, broker_Order_Seq, trade_Source ) values( #{brokerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{investorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instrumentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderRef,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exchangeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{direction,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{orderSysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{participantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradingRole,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{exchangeInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{offsetFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{hedgeFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{volume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tradeDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tradeTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tradeType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{priceSource,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{traderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderLocalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clearingPartId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sequenceNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tradingDay,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{settlementId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{brokerOrderSeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tradeSource,jdbcType=CHAR} )
